clinical_history: Patient with persistent infection and fever of unknown origin.
findings: No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Focal uptake in brain frontal lobe consistent with post-surgical changes.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
